summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of Customer Portal feature. All 7 required features working correctly: portal login page renders at /portal, login form with Email + Order Number inputs, API endpoint validation, error handling, My Orders navigation link, Back to Home functionality, and responsive design.
passed_tests: Portal Login Page - Renders correctly at /portal route with proper styling
Login Form Inputs - Email and Order Number fields present and functional
Portal Login API - /api/portal/login endpoint working correctly
Invalid Credentials Handling - Returns 401 status and displays error message
Missing Data Validation - Returns 422 status for missing email/order_id
My Orders Navigation - Link visible in homepage header navigation
My Orders Link Function - Correctly navigates from homepage to portal
Back to Home Link - Present and functional, navigates to homepage
Error Message Display - Shows 'Invalid email or order number' in red styling
Form Validation - HTML5 validation working for required fields
Responsive Design - Portal works correctly on desktop (1920x1080)
Mobile Responsiveness - Portal displays properly on mobile (390x844)
Tablet Responsiveness - Portal displays properly on tablet (768x1024)
Professional Styling - Clean, modern design with proper spacing and colors
API Integration - Frontend correctly calls backend portal login endpoint
Navigation Flow - Complete user journey from homepage → My Orders → portal works
URL Routing - /portal route properly configured in React Router
